moodish.securityfilter.records

Class SecurityFilterClients

  • java.lang.Object
    • moodish.securityfilter.records.SecurityFilterClients

  • public class SecurityFilterClients
extends java.lang.Object
    Class that stores the clients that have sent a mood message to the server.
    Version:
    1
    Author:
    Default/Group 10

        public boolean checkClientLastMoods(java.lang.String nickname,
                           int timeLapse,
                           int numMoods)
        Check if client's last received numMoods moods are inside the time interval.
        Parameters:
        timeLapse - The time interval.
        numMoods - Number of moods to be checked.
        Returns:
        true if the last received numMoods are inside the time interval, otherwise false.
